title: My Lol Client Keeps bugsplatting
body: Well my lol client bugsplats as soon as i open the client i tried reinstalling it but it did not work. Once it opens and bugsplats league continues trying to open league of legends and it bug splats and then tries again and its in a continuous loop. Please  help

replies.body: We've been seeing a sudden influx of these, and it turns out that this specific instance might be caused by Discord Overlay.  Disabling that for now should resolve the crashing issues.

It has been doing this for me as well. It started when I clicked the game mode to start a game. I've tried relaunching the game 3 or 4 times and each time has been an endless loop of bugsplatting. {{item:3026}}
I've got the same problem this morning, not sure why. Updating my graphics card atm, hopefully it'll fix it.

I'm having the same exact problem and I know one of my friends is too. Seems like this is very recent. Please help? It keeps on bugsplatting. I've tried running as admin, refreshing, and shutting down. Like the other guy, i have a loop as well.
disable discord overlay and it fixes the issue! no clue why that is the issue though{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I know that this isn't the place for this and I should just send a ticket but I'm gold 5 this is my first post I keep getting the level 7 can't comment restrictions can someone help me with this
Run the game as "Run as Administrator"
Porocles said a solution.  Disable your Discord Overlay if you're using discord.  That worked for me.

I right clicked my desktop shortcut for league and ran as admin and that seemed to work. I was doing a bit of research and the community is saying it is a problem with discord and that disabling discord overlay will help.

I found a work-around for this. Right click the client's shortcut, go to it's files. And open the lol.launcher.admin, it'll open the legacy client's startup screen and you'll be able to access League from there.
Same issues, somebody has a fix yet?
